bt.Model

Class WeightedRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • bt.Model.Request
      • bt.Model.WeightedRequest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<WeightedRequest>

     class WeightedRequest
extends Request
implements java.lang.Comparable<WeightedRequest>
    Author:
    Isaac Yochelson, Robert Schomburg and Fernando Geraci This class encapsulates an object of the class Request to hold a queue weight for the request.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int weight 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      WeightedRequest(int index, int begin, int length)
      Constructor with default weight of 1
      WeightedRequest(int index, int begin, int length, int weight)
      Constructor with all fields specified Constructor with default weight parameter explicitly defined.
      WeightedRequest(Request request)
      Constructor for a weighted request from an existing request with a default weight of 1.
      WeightedRequest(Request request, int weight)
      Constructor for a weighted request from an existing request with an explicitly defined weight.
